attributes.action: introduce legislation to prevent any discrimination against Armed Forces personnel on account of their employment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Soldiers, sailors and airmen have been refused entry to nightclubs, bars, even hotels because of their service. Whilst an establishment should have the right to take service number details, it should not have the right to refuse entry point blank.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
